checkboxes_header_title: Add extra base plate for Moza or Rhino FFB stick bases
checkboxes_header_subtitle: Add extra adapter plate for quicker swap out between center and side mount. One base plate for center mount, 2nd base plate for side mount and 3rd plate attached to stick base.
multiple_checkboxes_options_title: Base plate for Moza or Rhino FFB stick bases
multiple_checkboxes_options_value: Base plate for Moza or Rhino FFB stick bases
product_header_title: Enhance the DCS edition base package cockpit with large adapter plates:
product_header_subtitle:
These plates, combined with quick-release knobs for easy hot-swapping, make the DCS edition fully compatible with all side-mounted flight controls on the market.
List of compatible controls: Logitech (Saitek) X-56, Logitech (Saitek) X-52 (PRO), Thrustmaster T16000M, Thrustmaster Airbus, Thrustmaster T.Flight, Hori, CH Products, VKB Gladiator, Turtle Beach Velocity One Stick.

product_header_title: Enhance the DCS edition base package cockpit with large adapter plates:
product_header_subtitle:
Adapter plate model I is compatible with following controls:
VKB: all Gladiator NXT EVO, Virpil: all control panels 1, 2, 3, Virpil: all throttles, Winwing: Ursa all sticks.
Plate is meant for horizontal mount. Plate is available as an addon option with following base packages or kits:
Configuration #1
Configuration #2
DCS cockpit
Hybrid cockpit
